meanings.definition: The name given to a person at the time of their birth.
meanings.sent2: She always uses her birthname on official documents.
meanings.sent3: When I forget my birthname, my mom playfully calls me 'mystery child'.
meanings.sent4: Her birthname is like a hidden treasure waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The birthname is like a special gift from the past, connecting us to our roots.

meanings.definition: The original name of a person before any changes or modifications.
meanings.sent1: His birthname was different from the one he uses now.
meanings.sent2: The birthname on his old ID card was hard to read.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her birthname sounded like a superhero alias.
meanings.sent4: The birthname whispered secrets of a forgotten time.
meanings.sent5: In the quiet of the night, the birthname echoed through the halls of memory.
